blocks.value: The Powers are the sixth choir of angels. They are the warrior angels who fight against evil spirits and defend humanity from demonic attacks. Their primary mission is spiritual warfare, protecting the world from the forces of darkness.

The Powers stand guard over the pathways to Heaven, preventing demons from overtaking souls and maintaining the boundaries between good and evil. They are entrusted with the salvation of souls from demonic influences and temptations.

These angels also oversee the distribution of power among humanity and ensure that divine power is not misused. They maintain order and prevent chaos in the spiritual realm. The Powers teach us the reality of spiritual warfare and the importance of vigilance against evil. They remind us that we have powerful heavenly allies in our battle against sin and temptation. Through their example, we learn to be strong in faith, to resist evil, and to rely on God's strength rather than our own.
